text: Allah taâ€™ala ko qurbaaniyo ke gosht nahi pahonchte, na un ke qoon, balke ose to tumhaare dil ki parhezgaari pahonchti hai, isi tarah Allah ne un jaanwaro ko tumhaara muthi kar diya hai ke tum us ki rehnumaayi ke shukriye mein us ki badaaiyya bayaan karo aur nek logo ko khush qabri suna di jiye
